titles.title: Earned Income Credit Information Act of 2008
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to require employers to notify their employees of the availability of the earned income credit.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 6/25/2008--Introduced. Earned Income Credit Information Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to require certain employers (with more than 25 employees) to provide their employees with a notice explaining the earned income tax credit and eligibility rules for such credit.
